alert.note: Alert for Auglaize; Shelby (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 7:25PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SHELBY AND SOUTHWESTERN AUGLAIZE COUNTIES THROUGH 800 PM EDT... At 724 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over Fort Loramie, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Sidney, New Bremen, Minster, Newport, Anna, Fort Loramie, Hardin, Port Jefferson, Lockington, Newbern, Lake Loramie State Park, Ballou, Plattsville, Mccartyville, Swanders, Pemberton and Houston. This includes I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 87 and 100. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
